3p_serial_killer_im_bp.name: Serial Killer
3p_serial_killer_im_bp.description:
Welcome to Random! You are a Serial Killer.

Role Abilities:
- You may each night choose to kill a player.
- At the beginning of the game, you may select either a one-use bulletproof vest or investigative immunity.

Win Condition: You win when you are the last player alive, or that is inevitable.

3p_arsonist_im_bp.name: Arsonist
3p_arsonist_im_bp.description:
Welcome to Random! You are an Arsonist.

Role Abilities:
- You may each night choose to either douse a player, or to ignite and kill all the doused players.
- At the beginning of the game, you may select either a one-use bulletproof vest or investigative immunity.

Win Condition: You win when you are the last player alive, or that is inevitable.

3p_fool.name: Fool
3p_fool.description:
Welcome to Random! You are a Fool.

You have no actions. If you get lynched, all the remaining players will lose.

Win Condition: You win when you get lynched.

3p_jester.name: Jester
3p_jester.description:
Welcome to Random! You are a Jester.

You have no actions.

Win Condition: You win when you get lynched.

3p_survivor.name: Survivor
3p_survivor.description:
Welcome to Random! You are a Survivor.

You have no actions.

Win Condition: You win if you survive until the end of the game.

mafia_deflector.name: Mafia Deflector
mafia_deflector.description:
Welcome to Random! You are a Mafia Deflector.

Role Abilities:
- You may each night choose to deflect all actions performed on a player on to another player.

Factional Abilities:
- You are given a common mafia night chat with the other mafias.
- You may each night use the mafia factional kill on a player.

Win Condition: You win when mafia gains majority and all other threats are eliminated.

mafia_1_shot_deflector.name: Mafia 1-shot Deflector
mafia_1_shot_deflector.description:
Welcome to Random! You are a Mafia 1-shot Deflector.

Role Abilities:
- You can at night, once during the game, choose to deflect all actions performed on a player on to another player. You are only seen as visiting the second player.

Factional Abilities:
- You are given a common mafia night chat with the other mafias.
- You may each night use the mafia factional kill on a player.

Win Condition: You win when mafia gains majority and all other threats are eliminated.

mafia_2_shot_deflector.description:

- You may each night use the mafia factional kill on a player.

Win Condition: You win when mafia gains majority and all other threats are eliminated.

mafia_doctor.description:
Welcome to Random! You are a Mafia Doctor.

Role Abilities:

Factional Abilities:
- You are given a common mafia night chat with the other mafias.
- You may each night use the mafia factional kill on a player.

Win Condition: You win when mafia gains majority and all other threats are eliminated.

mafia_lawyer.name: Mafia Lawyer
mafia_lawyer.description:
Welcome to Random! You are a Mafia Lawyer.

Role Abilities:
- You may each night choose to flip the alignment cop result of a player for the night.
If they are normally revealed as «Town» they are this night instead revealed as «Anti-town». In addition, if they normally appear as «Anti-town» they will this night appear as «Town».

Factional Abilities:
- You are given a common mafia night chat with the other mafias.
- You may each night use the mafia factional kill on a player.

Win Condition: You win when mafia gains majority and all other threats are eliminated.

town_cupid.description:

Role Abilities:
- You can at night, once during the game, choose to match two players. The matched players will receive a common night chat. If for some reason one of the matched players dies, the other will commit suicide over the loss. 

Win Condition: You win when all threats to town has been eliminated and there is at least one member of town left.

town_governor.description:

Win Condition: You win when all threats to town has been eliminated and there is at least one member of town left.
